many creationists would deny that this is creationism at all , and rather be called " theistic evolution " , just as many scientists allow voice to their spiritual side .很多创造学家就会完全拒绝这个是创造说，而宁愿被叫做“有神论进化”，正如很多科学家表达其灵性的一面。

the God of theistic religious naturalists is not a supernatural deity , but instead a power or force within the natural universe .神论宗教自然主义的神并不是一个超自然的神只，而是自然宇宙中的能力或力量。
